dmca.title: Planet.Com C&D Notice
dmca.body:
July 26, 2007

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
Attention:  Legal Department
CO: [Private]
1333 North Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207
Fax: (214) 782-7756 / Email: copyright@theplanet.com
                  

Re:  Copyright Violations of ECMastery.com



We request the assistance of ThePlanet.Com Internet Services Inc (ThePlanet.com) to have copyrighted material that belongs to Cendien Corp be removed from a site hosted on ThePlanet.com network and servers. We?ve tried unsuccessfully contacting the owner of the ECMastery.com domain to have them remove all copyrighted material so we would like you facilitate contact information of such domain. Our copyrighted material/intellectual property has been illegally reproduced on the site hosted on your servers in your network. 

As I am sure you are aware, intellectual property (IP) reproduction without the full consent and authorization of the owners is considered a violation of US federal copyright laws. Cendien Corp HAS NEVER authorized legal reproduction of any copyrighted material to ECMastery.com and/or ThePlanet.com and/or any entities or persons associated with the ecmastery.com domain or organization. 

Intellectual property belonging to Cendien Corp does not belong to ECMastery so we request that all copyrighted information be removed immediately. Failure to remove such content constitutes ground for seeking damages for profiting and benefiting from our original work. Copyright infringement is illegal and wrong so we respectfully ask for your immediate assistance to have the ECMastery.com site REMOVE ALL copyrighted material/intellectual property belonging to Cendien Corp. 

In the event that we are force to seek a legal injunction and possibly damages to protect our material, we ask for your assistance. Please provide us with the name of legal counsel so we can discuss the issue with your legal department immediately.


Respectfully,
  

Israel Denis

 
Screenshots taken:  2007/07/20
Copyright Violations Reported By:  Copyscape.com

Evidence Preserved
